name: Burg_210
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with nautical argot
diet: smoked fish, seaweed, salted provisions
regular tide-festivals and small votive offerings
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or long-range mind influence
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steamworks
notes: sheltered cove; frequent coastal trader waypoint
seasonal population surge during trading season
